channel.title: Computer Aided Design on Edi Liberato
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Aided Design on Edi Liberato

item.title: Gömböc
item.description: One line of code and you have it! Weird? Cool? Wizardry?

item.title: Parametric Stepper Motor Bracket
item.description: This design may be simple but it is useful, I can attest.

item.title: Minimalist Raspberry Pi Stand
item.description: Last month I had the pleasure to visit Ireland and spend some quality time with a special person while exploring that enchanting land.

item.title: Man Against (Washing) Machine
item.description: One of my personal favorite uses of 3d printers at home is to fix broken stuff.

item.title: ASTM D638 Tensile Test Specimens
item.description: No need to say much about the classical ASTM D638 tensile test specimens AKA dogbones.

item.title: Plywood Connectors
item.description: I made this about two years ago and even though I liked the outcome pretty much I decided not to post anything about it at the time.

item.title: Parametric Spiral Lampshade
item.description: I had the idea to make a 3d printed bedside lamp as a b-day present for my friend Akarsh.

item.title: Dovetail Jig Revisited
item.description: I’m revisiting my dovetail jig because when I was looking at Cadquery 2.

item.title: Sawing Guides
item.description: The idea here is the same as my dovetail jig but now one is inteded to aid making square cuts on wood with hand saws and the other 45 degrees cut for joinery.

item.title: Dovetail Guide
item.description: This is my take on dovetail guides, I designed this to be 3d printed and parametric.

item.title: Kugelwellenhorn
item.description: I always have been intrigued by horns. Actually by passive devices in general, tunned mass dampers, RLC circuits to name a few.

item.title: CD Organizer
item.description: I had some old CDs lying around the house and I decided to organized them in a single place.

item.title: Cadquery Turners Cube
item.description: Back in Brazil, during my machinist apprenticeship, one of the lathe tasks of the manual machining course was to make a turners cube.

item.title: Cadquery Chess Set
item.description: This is my debute 3d printing project. A chess set designed in cadquery.
